title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message:
No chime. MacOS will not detect any audio devices (settings no mic/in/out). 

Where do start?

title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message:
Any history available?
Check U6201 power rails; start with U6200.

title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message:
Other than sound. Everything else seems to be ok so far.

C6411 got knocked off and U6410 seems to have a little chip around the corner (at pin1)

U6200:
pin 1 (PP4V5_AUDIO_ANALOG) = 4.5v
pin 3 (4V5_NR) = 1.2v
pin 4 (4V5_REG_EN) = 3.3v
pin 6 (4V5_REG_IN) = 5.1v

PP3V3_S0_AUDIO_ANALOG - 3.3v
PP5V_S0_AUDIO_AMP_L - 5.1v
PP5V_S4_AUDIO_XW - 5.1v

L6300 = 1.5v

title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message:
Check resistors and traces between PCH and audio coedec; like R6331, etc.
If all good, change U6201.

title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message: checked R6331. R1310, R1311, R1312, R1313 they are all good. Is there any other that I missed that I should check before changing U6201?

title: 820-3476-A no audio (no chime, no audio devices detected)
message:
Change it now.
Be sure to get good solders...
